TEXT: Master of the art of Blades. NL Sent to the Spire after the first Bladedancer failed.
NL You tighten your grip on your Blades...

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"Join~ ~us,~ ~Dancing~ ~one,~ ~and~ ~feel~ ~the~ ~warmth~ ~of~ ~the~ ~Spire."~
